search_input:
Although ornamentation might have gone out of fashion a bit in the modern "stile", we also have to admit that people still love decoration, most notably the most intimate surface of a person is more and more subject to decoration: the skin.

*From tattoos to permanent makeup, we have seen a significant rise in people using their bodies as a canvas for self-expression and personal style.*
suggested_query: From tattoos to permanent makeup, we have seen a significant rise in people using their bodies as a canvas for self-expression and personal style.
suggest_context: Although ornamentation might have gone out of fashion a bit in the modern "stile", we also have to admit that people still love decoration, most notably the most intimate surface of a person is more and more subject to decoration: the skin.
